org.gradle.api.plugins.tomcat.tasks
[Groovy] Class TomcatRun

java.lang.Object
  org.gradle.api.DefaultTask
      org.gradle.api.plugins.tomcat.tasks.Tomcat
          org.gradle.api.plugins.tomcat.tasks.AbstractTomcatRun
              org.gradle.api.plugins.tomcat.tasks.TomcatRun

class TomcatRun
extends AbstractTomcatRun

Deploys an exploded web application to an embedded Tomcat web container. Does not require that the web application be assembled into a war, saving time during the development cycle.

Authors:
Benjamin Muschko

Property Summary
java.io.File classesDirectory

The directory containing the compiled class files.

FileCollection webAppClasspath

The web application's classpath.

java.io.File webAppSourceDirectory

The web application's source directory.

Property Detail

classesDirectory

@InputDirectory
@Optional
java.io.File classesDirectory
The directory containing the compiled class files. This property is optional as a web application project may simply not contain any classes.

webAppClasspath

@InputFiles
FileCollection webAppClasspath
The web application's classpath. This classpath usually contains the external libraries assigned to the compile and runtime configurations.

webAppSourceDirectory

@InputDirectory
@Optional
java.io.File webAppSourceDirectory
The web application's source directory. For applications following the Servlet 3.x specification this directory is not required.
